attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, strongly object to the Boundary Commission’s proposal to abolish Newcastle’s parliamentary constituency. These proposals completely disregard Newcastle’s community identity by splitting it into two. We would prefer to see the constituency retained and enlarged to include Madeley and Loggerheads & Whitmore.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Boundary Commission for England who have recently launched a consultation into their latest Boundary Review and would welcome comments from Members of the public. Please visit the BCE website for further details.
